tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE segmentation_emails (
  email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  email_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  segmentation_criteria VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  send_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  opened BOOLEAN,
  clicked BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE customers (
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_name VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    segment_id INT,
    last_purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE customers ( 
    customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    first_name VARCHAR(50), 
    last_name VARCHAR(50), 
    email VARCHAR(100), 
    segment VARCHAR(50) 
);

CREATE TABLE emails ( 
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    customer_id INT, 
    sent_date TIMESTAMP, 
    opened BOOLEAN, 
    clicked BOOLEAN 
);
